articles.author: Lauren Edmonds
articles.title: Blue Origin: William Shatner hits back at George Takei - Insider
articles.description: William Shatner took to Twitter on Friday to respond to George Takei's comments about him and the Blue Origin spaceflight.
articles.content:
William Shatner criticized his former "Star Trek" co-star George Takei, who called Shatner a "guinea pig" and "unfit" following his Blue Origin spaceflight.
Shatner shared a pointed Twitter post dir… [+2325 chars]

articles.author: Jason Chester, Sameer Suri
articles.title: Michael Caine confirms he is not ready to give up working - Daily Mail
articles.description: The veteran star, now 88, was appearing on BBC Radio 5 to promote his latest movie Best Sellers when he bemoaned the lack of opportunities for older actors.
articles.content:
Sir Michael Caine has confirmed he is not stepping away from the Hollywood mainstream after prompting retirement rumours during a recent interview.
